analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/29/0xe6ba91e78eec90c8475c8a3d78de414229e204bd.sol:
	Contract ChieldCureToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/29/0xe6ba91e78eec90c8475c8a3d78de414229e204bd.sol#197-199)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/29/0xe6ba91e78eec90c8475c8a3d78de414229e204bd.sol:
